original_text: Six days may work be done; but in the seventh is the sabbath of rest, holy to the Lord: whosoever doeth any work in the sabbath day, he shall surely be put to death.
korean_text: 엿새 동안은 일할 것이나 일곱째 날은 큰 안식일이니 여호와께 거룩한 것이라 안식일에 일하는 자는 누구든지 반드시 죽일지니라

sentences.original_text: Six days may work be done
but in the seventh is the sabbath of rest
whosoever doeth any work in the sabbath day
he shall surely be put to death
